text: At the World's Limit () is a 1975 Soviet drama movie directed by Rodion NahapetovБез надеждыНА КРАЙ СВЕТА... (1975) and stars Vera Glagoleva, Vadim Mikheyenko, and Boris Andreyev. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1975 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: At the World's Limit
